reviews.customers_say: Customers love the cardigan's color, with one noting its even weave, and appreciate its hand-knitted construction and perfect fit that's not too big. The sweater is soft, comfortable, and warm, making it a perfect gift choice, particularly for birthdays. While customers find it well worth the money, opinions about the price are mixed.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and beautiful cable ivory cardigan!!!
items.body: This Aran Craft ivory cardigan (coatigan) is the softest, most luxurious sweater I have ever seen!!! The quality is beautiful and symmetrical with all the cables and it's an open style... no buttons... It's also heavy enough for pretty cold climates, but I'm in S. California for wintertime and it will be perfect. I've been eyeing this for quite some time and so happy to now own one!!! I'm a size 8-10, 5' tall, and the medium is a perfect fit!!! Thank you to Aran Crafts!!! Read more
items.author: Pam from San Diego

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality sweater that will last a lifetime
items.body: I love Aran Craft sweaters and own several - love this one so much. Simple, elegant with any outfit, warm and comfy. Read more
items.author: Nanny D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater is absolutely gorgeous!
items.body: Very thick, warm and cozy. The stitching is impressive and it looks and feels soft, lush and expensive. Definitely not your average department store cardigan. I ordered a medium and it fits beautifully. Though it doesn’t have buttons, the front stays in place perfectly on its own. I understand why this gets 5 stars consistently. Read more
items.author: M. S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent!
items.body: I LOVE this sweater! It is well made and beautiful with a lovely pattern and the knit is not too loose. The only drawback is that the pockets are too shallow - only big enough for you to curl your hands into a fist and barely get them in. I wish I could get someone to enlarge them. Other than that, I highly recommend this sweater to anyone! Read more
items.author: M.A. in TN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most beautiful sweater I've ever owned...
items.body: This sweater is stunningly beautiful. The color is rich and the knitting is perfection. I've never owned a more beautiful and durably knit sweater. Read more
items.author: Kim McPherson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift
items.body: It is a gift for my daughter’s birthday. Not until the 21st I think it is beautiful. Thank you Read more
items.author: Anne murphy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but Pricey
items.body: The quality is excellent—soft, cozy, and well-made—but definitely overpriced. Shrinks if machine-washed, so hand wash only. Great for careful use, not everyday laundry. Read more
items.author: O.D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great!
items.body: It's exactly what I wanted, not too big, didn't want to layer it over other sweaters. It looks beautiful. Natural color is lovely! The weight is fine and very warm. Read more
items.author: Kate's 43

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Natural. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
